page.title: 08Industrial Sites
page.content: There are 2 industrial estates around Launceston. They are called the Pennygillam Estate and the Scarne Estate. Pennygillam has the most factories in this area. Abru Aluminium is the largest producer and employs the most people. They make aluminium ladders and other products.The smallest business is Greenbank Garden Equipment who employ only three people. J B Smith has been on the industrial estate the longest and is thought to have been the second oldest Vauxhall dealer in the country. The Scarne Industrial estate is much smaller than Pennygillam. The largest employer is St Regis Packaging, and the smallest business is Bailey's Upholsterers which only employs 2 people.English China Clay have had a factory here for 40 years.
